about_the_game:
Battle Across the Stars: Become the Ultimate Starborn Survivor!
In the vast expanse of the galaxy, you step into the metal shoes of a Starborn Survivor, a robotic mercenary in search of the next big gig. The fringes of space teem with small colony planets under siege by alien invaders. Your mission? Navigate through these distant worlds, engaging in fierce battles to eliminate the extraterrestrial threat. With each planet comes a formidable boss that stands between you and your paycheck. Survival is the name of the game, and victory ensures your reward as you clear planet after planet of the alien menace.

Forge Your Path Through the Stars: Customize, Upgrade, and Conquer!
Embark on a quest for purpose and legacy as the galaxy's last Starborn Survivor, a relic of a bygone era armed with ancient technology and a drive to protect. Begin your journey with three core abilities and an array of basic weaponry, remnants of your once formidable arsenal. Discover attachments scattered across the cosmos or available for acquisition from the archives accessed via the main command interface. Utilize rifle arms for precision strikes, grappling hooks for strategic navigation, and head-mounted turrets to unleash fiery havoc upon your adversaries. As you confront and vanquish the alien invaders threatening the fringes of space, you will earn credits, the currency of the forgotten, allowing you to unlock and equip advanced modular components. Each piece not only enhances your combat capabilities but also brings you closer to understanding your origins and the full extent of your abilities. Prepare to adapt, evolve, and confront the alien menace, ensuring the legacy of your kind endures in the vast, uncharted depths of space.

Shape Your Destiny: Explore, Adapt, and Unleash Your Full Potential!
Venture into the cosmos's forgotten corners as the last Starborn Survivor, wielding technology from a civilization long vanished. Your path is laden with both standard enhancements and artifacts of legendary prowess, each capable of molding your tactics and defining your odyssey. Yet, tread cautiously – the universe is unforgiving, and the relics of your past achievements are wiped clean with each new endeavor. Make each decision with wisdom and adaptability, for the challenges ahead demand both. Experiment with the myriad of lost technologies at your disposal, forging powerful synergies that echo the might of your predecessors. Embrace the journey to unlock the mysteries of your existence and manifest the full magnitude of your legacy amidst the stars.
